title: Equiprobability
summary: Equiprobability is a property for a collection of events that each have the same probability of occurring.[1] In statistics and probability theory it is applied in the discrete uniform distribution and the equidistribution theorem for rational numbers. If there are n {\textstyle n} events under consideration, the probability of each occurring is 1 n . {\textstyle {\frac {1}{n}}.}
